divs: Sighting Detailswe go to a pilgrimage every year at lac st anne near alberta beach edmonton it was about 9 pm i looked up in the sky and saw this light coming down out of the sky the camp site i was in had 100dreds of people the sphere came in sound less it hovered above us about twenty feet i couldnt beleive what i was seeing and i went to the camp next to us and asked if they where seeing what i was seeing it was like the sphere was asking why we were there and what our gathering was all about it was like mental telepathy i got two pictures on a phone camera as it was leaving this was not the first time i saw this spere
Summary: sprere round red like hs inner ring color inside went from smoke grey to white in center hundreds of witnesses
